UPDATE t_news
type_id = #{typeId},
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
tags = #{tags},
remark = #{remark},
is_receipt = #{isReceipt},
start_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
end_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
receiver_type = #{receiverType},
receiver_id = #{receiverId},
record_user_id = #{recordUserId},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
record_flag = #{recordFlag},
update_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
mapper.select: SELECT t1.record_id, t1.type_id, t1.record_time, t1.record_flag, t1.title, t1.content, t1.tags, t1.remark, t1.is_receipt, DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') start_time, DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end_time, t1.receiver_type, t1.receiver_id, t1.record_user_id, DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, t1.update_user_id, t2.user_name record_user_name, t3.user_name update_user_name, t4.`name` type_name FROM (SELECT * FROM t_news WHERE record_id = #{recordId} AND record_flag = 1) t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.record_user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user t3 ON t1.update_user_id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN t_category t4 ON t1.type_id = t4.record_id
